Koga Shuko/Scattershot/Anubis/Hades/Unitron:
 
 As he got down behind a boulder, Zardus' lasers chipping at the boulder 
quickly, Koga Shuko thought about the words he had heard.  "New units".  
Merely those two words.  Bringing up a com to all units he yelled: "Fall 
back!".  putting his arm backwards, he fired a few shots off at Zardus' 
boulder, raising his missile launcher and firing a rocket off at Perndabot's 
pelvis.
------------------------------
Scattershot flew to the side, a few stray shots catching him in the side, 
yelping, he pulled out another charge, flipping DevilDuer off, he threw the 
charge down at him.
-----------------------------
Unitron yelped from DevilDuer's shot, firing a single bolt of laser fire at 
the Alliance member's left knee.  Laughing as Perndabot slams into a tree, 
his emerald optic sensors seem to widen as he sees the missile launcher, 
leaping to the left, firing his rocket off at the Alliance base, and a few 
shots off at Perndabot, half of the Alliance member's rocket collides into 
Unitron's left side, exploding, sending Unitron into a evil looking twirl, 
Unitron slamming to the ground in pain.  Getting up, Unitron fired his last 
rocket off at DevilDuer's back, firing off a laser bolt at Zardus, rushing 
off as ordered by Koga Shuko, the owner of Shuko Internation getting up and 
leaping into the air, running into the protection of the foilage.
-------------------------------
Anubis, the Jackle-God (namesake, that is), laughs manically as Bloodstrike 
is impaled on his claws, but screams as a swipe from the robot's sword cuts 
off all of his fingers except his middle and pointed fingers.  Growling 
madly, as mech-fluid shot out of his cut off fingers like a small oil gusher, 
he stretched his remaining fingers apart as best he could, stabbing his two 
claws at Blood's optics (one for the left optic, the other for the right).
------------------------------
Hades, firing off a few laser blasts at an autogun, fired a missile off at 
the Alliance base, only having two left.  Seeing Koga Shuko pinned, he fired 
a rocket off at Zardus' back, firing his remaining rocket at Bloodstrike's 
left side.
